synopsis: Defeated by the Black King, the Volunteer Army and its allies regroup.
Aram becomes friends with Yuri and the gang. They realize that Pirika must be alive, and set out.
Aram is offered a good sword by Dusty, serving only to further upset Burckhardt. Their strained relationship, compounded by Burckhardt's baggage, causes unforeseen problems.
The gang finds their way to the Sage's Tower in search of leads on Pirika. They are not given a very warm welcome.
Aram and Yuri are stranded in Maze Pass. They learn more about each other, and discover some unlikely allies and enemies.
With Shuza going after the Chain Chronicle, Juliana makes the decision to succeed the throne.
Having lost Yuri to the Black Army, Aram and Phoena press onwards to Spirit Island to find answers as to Pirika's whereaboutsâ€”and to how they might save Yuri.
Phoena and Aram make it to Yggdra, where they meet an administrator. They scan through the Chronicle in search of answers.
Phoena and Aram arrive at the Desert City to seek the help of Musica, who they hope can awaken a dragon with her voice.
Phoena and Aram escort Musica aboard the Ark. They infiltrate the Black King's fortress.

title.jp: Ken ni Iki, Ken ni Taoeruru

synopsis: The Black King Suppression Army engages the Black King's army in the final battle. Meanwhile, the Black King captures Phoena.
With the end of the world imminent, Phoena takes it upon herself to absorb Black Element in order to buy time.
